text: On February 13, 2023, a shooting happened at Michigan State University. The shooter, Anthony McRae, who was not a student at the school, killed 3 students before committing suicide. The shooting, along with the Oxford High School shooting, are the deadliest school shootings in the history of Michigan. title: Michigan State University shooting
